long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟 🗂️ Tab Manager Chrome Extension - Your Ultimate Tab Organizer! 🌟

Are you overwhelmed by a sea of open tabs? 😩 Struggling to stay organized and productive while browsing? Tab Manager is your solution! This powerful Chrome extension streamlines tab management, helping you maintain focus, reduce memory usage, and effortlessly track your open tabs.

🔑 Key Features
• Open Tabs 📄 — View and manage all open tabs, organized by pinned, ungrouped, and grouped categories. Access, mute, sleep, or close tabs with ease. You can also close, ungroup, or pin groups. Pinning a group allows you to retrieve it when you start up again. 
• Auto Group 📂 — Automatically organize tabs based on customizable URL patterns, perfect for categorizing your work tabs.
• Options ⚙️ — Customize settings such as auto-close, auto-sleep, lazy load, and configure auto-grouping for an optimized browsing experience.

🚀 Getting Started
Install from the Chrome Web Store.
Open the Extension from your toolbar to view and manage tabs.
Set Up Auto Grouping and other preferences in the Options tab to customize the experience to your workflow.

💡 Why Tab Manager?
Our extension is designed for simplicity and power, allowing you to focus on what matters without the distractions of cluttered tabs. Optimized for both productivity enthusiasts and casual users, Tab Manager helps save time, reduce memory usage, and keeps your workspace tidy.

📜 Open-Source & Contributing
Tab Manager is proudly open-source and welcomes contributions! Check out our GitHub repository to get involved and help improve this extension for everyone:

https://github.com/MaryEhb/tab-manager-chrome-extension

About the author: This extension was made by Mariem Ehab as part of her application for Ship Or Sink C2. You can follow her on LinkedIn here: https://www.linkedin.com/in/mariem-ehab-1431301b3/

Ship Or Sink: https://shiporsink.net/
